profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.7 Stream objects - Keywords spacing
profile.description: The stream keyword shall be followed either by a CARRIAGE RETURN (0Dh) and LINE FEED (0Ah) character sequence or by a single LINE FEED character. The endstream keyword shall be preceded by an EOL marker
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The stream keyword shall be followed either by a CARRIAGE RETURN (0Dh) and LINE FEED (0Ah) character sequence or by a single LINE FEED character. The endstream keyword shall be preceded by an EOL marker

error.message: Spacings of keywords 'stream' and 'endstream' do not comply PDF/A specification
